Talk2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Guess what, mister!<sp:0:4:0>Now that the weather's better, we're
slowly getting back the goods we didn't
have enough of.<sp:0:4:0>I'll work extra hard to sell them! Stop by
our store, OK?
Talk2005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Why not shop at the Slippery Falcon?
We've got all the stuff you could need!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Especially now that the blizzard's over!
We can finally restock all the products we
couldn't before.<sp:0:4:0>If you ever need to prepare for a long
journey, make us your first stop!
Talk2006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Evening, mister!<sp:0:4:0>Thanks to things warming up after the
blizzard, the Slippery Falcon general store
has all the stuff you've been waiting on!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We're open even after the sun goes down,
so come and shop anytime!
Talk2007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You can shop even after dark at the
Slippery Falcon, a general store with
all the stuff you could want!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>And without the blizzard to worry about,
we're restocking all the products we
didn't have on the shelves before!<sp:0:4:0>If you're preparing for a long journey,
be sure to come shop with us first!
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>This is the <clr:0000>Slippery Falcon <clr:ffff>general store.
We won't let a little blizzard stop us from
serving our customers with a smile!
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Welcome to the <clr:0000>Slippery Falcon<clr:ffff> general
store. <sp:5:0:0>You must have had a long day if
you're still shopping this late!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hooray, a customer! Welcome to the
<clr:0000>Slippery Falcon<clr:ffff> general store.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Thanks for stopping by in spite of
the weather!
Talk1006: <sp:3:0:2:0700>So, um... What can I do for you, mister?
Talk1007: <sp:3:0:2:0001>Can I help you with anything else?
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0001>How many of those do you have to sell?
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Sorry, mister, but...I can't really buy that.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is a shop where you can buy cooking
ingredients, plus all sorts of other stuff!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Although we haven't gotten much
business since the blizzard took out
the bridge...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, mister, have you seen the building
with the big horse on top of it <clr:0000>across
the bridge<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>The people there make these kind of thin
books called "newspapers."<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>They used to be our best customers, but I
haven't heard from them in a while...
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Whoa, whoa, mister! I can't buy anything
from you that you're still wearing!
Com_Talk_31: <sp:3:0:2:0001><clr:0000><snd:Greeting><clr:ffff>All right. How many were you thinking?
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Hehe, don't keep me in suspense, mister!
Show me what you're selling!
Talk1012_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Sorry our shelves are kinda empty. <sp:5:1:0>It's
'cause of all the heavy snowstorms.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>If you need food, like <clr:0000>fish <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>mushrooms<clr:ffff>,
you could try poking around in the caves
outside of town.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>There's a bunch of <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>along the road
to the east, and even more of them in the
Hebra Mountains.
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm excited to see what you've got!
Talk1012_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you poke around inside the caves, you
might find <clr:0000>fish <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>mushrooms <clr:ffff>that I don't
have for sale right now.<sp:0:4:0>Try the road to the east of here or up in
the Hebra Mountains to see if you can
find any <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>entrances.
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Thanks! <sp:5:1:0>I'll buy other stuff too,
if you want.
Com_Talk_02b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>OK! Do you have anything else to sell?
Just curious.
Com_Talk_02c:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Got it! Thanks! You don't happen to have
anything else for sale, do you?
Talk2016:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thank you very much! I'll make sure to
order some more.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>OK! Is that all, or did you want something
else while you're here?
Talk2017:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thanks a lot! I'd better make a note to
restock those.
Talk2018: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, was that the last one? Thank you!
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I don't have anything left to sell to you.
But you're welcome to sell stuff to me!
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh nooo! You don't have enough rupees
to pay for that, mister.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Huh? Your bag's all full. We can fix that!
Just sell me anything you don't need!
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Thank you! Don't forget to look at the
other stuff we have for sale too!
Talk2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey there, mister!<sp:0:4:0>Hee-hee. <sp:5:0:0>Now that it's warmer, we can
get all the products we couldn't before.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If there's anything the Slippery Falcon
general store can do for you, mister,
come stop by anytime!
Talk2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I did good at work today. I've gotta keep
it up tomorrow and the next day too!
